This issue is caused by cudnn. You could update your cudnn_5 to version >=cudnn_6. And guarantee your cuda version is cuda_8_0. By Guichao Lin At 2018-07-28 21:27:53, "CarlosYeverino" <notifications@github.com> wrote: I have the same issue. body_text:
This issue is caused by cudnn. You could update your cudnn_5 to version >=cudnn_6.

And guarantee your cuda version is cuda_8_0.



By Guichao Lin





At 2018-07-28 21:27:53, "CarlosYeverino" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

Caffe2 compiled from source clonning pytorch.

cuDNN 5.1.10

body:
This issue is caused by cudnn. You could update your cudnn_5 to version >=cudnn_6.

And guarantee your cuda version is cuda_8_0.



By Guichao Lin





At 2018-07-28 21:27:53, "CarlosYeverino" <notifications@github.com> wrote:


I have the same issue. My configuration below:
OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
Caffe2 compiled from source clonning pytorch.
Cuda 8.0
cuDNN 5.1.10
